channel.title: Help with moving shops
channel.description:
ok there is like 15 shops in my server.. but i dont know were half of them are... could some one tell me how to locate them and move them...
~Axiom~

item.title: Help with moving shops
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

shortcut

you can find the id of the npc you wanna move, walk right into him and do ::mypos, search one of the positions in autospawn and if you find more than one, look at the “spawn = NPCID” if the “NPCID” is to the npc ur aiming for, thats the npc that your looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with moving shops
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Autospawn.cfg - Contains the npcs id, the x, and the y coords.
Shops.cfg -Contains the shop id and the shops information
Client.java - Combines the information from both files to create the shop…

If you want to know the npcId that opens a shop. Shops.cfg and find the sop you want to move.
Than in Client.java search for wanneShop = SHOPID;
Where the SHOPID is the Id you found in shops.cfg, once you find that, look up a line and you will see the npcid

if (NPCID == ...) {

… being the npcId.
Than you open autospawn.cfg find that npcId and change the coords.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with moving shops
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

its not supposed to say x and y pos in the wanneshop. Positions for npc’s are in autospawn.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Help with moving shops
item.dc:creator: @Ruppich Ruppich
item.description:
@Ruppich wrote:

WanneShop = 5; //Shop's ID (In [b]shops.cfg[/b])
If your trying to find a specific shop, Look in your Shops.cfg as I Vain I tried to point out, Shop 1 would = WanneShop = 1;

(:

Read full topic

item.title: Help with moving shops
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

but how do i change the x-y cords if i dont know the name…because the things i want to change only have the name of the shops not of the npc and there is no id in shops…

and i cant find them in autospawn…any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with moving shops
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Look up the current npcs ID in autospawn.cfg, than change the coords.
